Piriform cortex layer 2.CytoDefiningCriteria: Compact layer of cell bodies in Nissl stains
DefiningCitation: G. S. The synaptic organization of the brain
Piriform cortex layer 2.Definition: Middle of three cytoarchitecturally defined layers of the piriform cortex characterized by a compact layer of cell bodies.  It can be divided into a superficial part and a more densely packed deep part
